title: The Cuckoo House
description: A young couple struggling with their own issues tries to start over in a house made vacant by the previous owners' deaths.Jane has had a series of miscarriages and wants only to conceive and start a family. Steve, a budding author, hopes to research the deaths of the previous inhabitants and write a thriller inspired by the events. As the hot summer stretches out, their goals collide and Steve begins to suspect that an evil presence lurks in the house, turning their dreams toward its own dark purpose.
author: Andre Harden
